Text.Page:
A unique opportunity presents itself.

{@LinkCreature:50#3} is to blame for much of what we see around us. One of the outriders spotted him in the Nest of the Shaper.

Fight your way past the argon defenses and slay this abominination.

Maskimxuul's death will slow, if not stop, the argon corruption of this region. We might even see some of the stolen energy diffuse into the land.

Your timely intervention gives us new options to consider. Thanks.
